Pre-Game Insights: The team will face Rashid Khan and Noor Ahmed, wrist spinners, for the first time.
Johnson Charles has scored at a strike rate of 166.07 against these spinners in 10 innings but has also been dismissed six times by them in T20Is since 2021.
Shimron Hetmyer has struggled against wrist spinners, scoring 115 runs off 142 balls at a strike rate of 80.99.
